author: uttiyasarkar
body:
Following the presentation in HLT upgrade meeting [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1550269/#4-round-robin-talk-on-dpgpog-s) dated 03.06.2025, we spotted a bug on the current Phase-2 DeepJet model for b-tagging [here](https://github.com/cms-data/RecoBTag-Combined/blob/master/DeepFlavourV02_PhaseII/DeepJet_retraining_phase2_new_inputs.onnx). 
It has a missing `Softmax` layer which makes the final DeepJet scores wrong.
The issue has been addressed and the model is modified with the additional `Softmax` step in the correct place. This model is validated and results are shown in the above mentioned presentation.

**This PR includes:**

- The fixed DeepJet onnx model with Softmax layer included.
title: fix:Phase2 onnx model with added Softmax layer
